page.title: 14Housing
page.content: There has been very little building of houses in Netherton for many years.6 two-storied stone-fronted houses were built by the Local Authority about 25 years ago. In the last 5 years three new detached bungalows have been built,all on separate sites. These have been built with composite stone. There are now plans in the pipe-line for 10 new houses for letting and two private bungalows in the field north east of the junction with the Alnwick, Whittingham road. Many of the farm cottages no longer used for farm workers are let as week-end or holiday cottages.
